```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

1.  Diamonds data set

```{r}
diamonddata = diamonds
```

2\.

```{r}
nrow(diamonddata)
ncol(diamonddata)
```

3\.

```{r}
ggplot(diamonddata, aes(x=carat, y=price)) + geom_point()
```

4, 5

```{r}
ggplot(diamonddata, aes(x=carat, y=price, color=cut)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~color)
```

6

```{r}
inventory<- read_csv("inventoryData.csv")
```

```{r}
skim(inventory)
```

```{r}
inventoryA <- inventory %>% filter(Supplier == "A")
```

```{r}
skim(inventoryA)
```

```{r}
inventoryA = inventoryA %>% mutate(OnHandRatio = `On Hand` / `Annual Demand`)
```

```{r}
avg_cost = inventoryA %>% group_by(`Item SKU`) %>% summarise(SKUAvgCost =mean(`Cost per Unit ($)`))
```

```{r}
avg_cost %>% filter(`Item SKU` == "011")
```
